data.name: Pizza
data.description: A delicious Italian dish consisting of a dough base topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings such as vegetables, meats, and herbs.

data.name: Burger
data.description: A classic American sandwich consisting of a meat patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, and condiments, served on a bun.

data.name: Sushi
data.description: A Japanese dish consisting of bite-sized pieces of raw fish or vegetables, served on top of rice and often accompanied by soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

data.name: Meat
data.description: A variety of cuts of meat, such as steak, ribs, and chops, cooked to perfection and served with a variety of sides, such as vegetables and potatoes.

data.name: Hotdog
data.description: A popular American street food consisting of a grilled or boiled sausage served in a soft bun and topped with condiments such as ketchup, mustard, and relish.
